game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an ancient artifact is buried within a long-forgotten ruin. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Travel to the Ruins of Eldoria
task.description: You need to reach the coordinates marked on your map as the Ruins of Eldoria.
Beneath the ruins lies a hidden chamber. Discover the entrance and descend into its depths.
